headlines.description: Liverpool rallied from a goal down to beat Burnley 3-1 at Turf Moor on Wednesday to keep pace with Premier League leaders Manchester City.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool beat Burnley for club's best start ever

headlines.description: Newcastle United finally registered a goal at Goodison Park as they earned a useful away point with a 1-1 draw against Everton on Wednesday to bounc
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle hold on for rare point at Everton

headlines.description: Fulham took the lead against Leicester City on Wednesday but were unable to hold on to it as they drew 1-1 to remain bottom of the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fulham still bottom of table after Leicester draw

headlines.description: Diogo Jota scored his first Premier League goal as Wolves came from behind to stun title hopefuls Chelsea 2-1 at Molineux on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jota fires winner as Wolves stun Chelsea

headlines.description: Manchester United and Arsenal played to a 2-2 draw on Wednesday night at Old Trafford that saw both sides miss on several chances take the victory.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man United, Arsenal play to dramatic draw

headlines.description: Tottenham responded in emphatic fashion from their derby defeat by Arsenal at the weekend with a comfortable and efficient 3-1 win over Southampton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs bounce back from derby to beat Saints
